alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 10:37PM EST until January 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 13 inches. Lake enhanced snow showers in the northeast flow behind the system will result in localized greater amounts in the high terrain from southwest of the city of Marquette to the Huron Mountains. The heavy snow will spread north across Marquette County between 8 AM and 11 AM EST on Thursday. Snowfall rates of at least 1 inch per hour will likely occur for several hours once it begins. Northeast winds will gust to around 30 mph. * WHERE...Marquette County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute and will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
